overview: The Christchurch Earthquake left the majority of its population devastated, but for a small group of homeless people, disaster brought about new and luxurious living opportunities – a taste of what it’s like to live like a king.
tagline: “After living on the street for 20 years, we’re now tasting what it’s like to live like Kings. We’re sleeping in fancy sheets, drinking champagne and living in mansions… and we’re fucking loving it.”
title: Living like Kings
